body_html:
Is there something fundamental to torch that would make this difficult? If not I'd be willing to look into submitting a PR.

The Tensor backend is not aware of zero-dim tensors, so a bunch of things in the backend need to be fixed fundamentally. changes are going to be hard, prob 100s or 1000s of lines touched.
body_text:
Is there something fundamental to torch that would make this difficult? If not I'd be willing to look into submitting a PR.

The Tensor backend is not aware of zero-dim tensors, so a bunch of things in the backend need to be fixed fundamentally. changes are going to be hard, prob 100s or 1000s of lines touched.
body:
> Is there something fundamental to torch that would make this difficult? If not I'd be willing to look into submitting a PR.

The Tensor backend is not aware of zero-dim tensors, so a bunch of things in the backend need to be fixed fundamentally. changes are going to be hard, prob 100s or 1000s of lines touched.
